rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a minimalistic design, incorporating local building norms. Designed to be the first point of contact.
An open-plan space combining living and dining areas. Designed for ample natural light with large windows.
The open-plan kitchen is integrated into the living area. Equipped with high-efficiency appliances and storage, following local building norms.
A spacious master bedroom facing east for positive energy. Includes built-in wardrobe and a small study area.
A guest room designed with natural elements and light to maintain a calm atmosphere.
A small utility area for laundry and storage, placed according to local building norms but not central to the living spaces.

openings.description: A robust yet welcoming entrance designed to face north for auspicious energy.
Large windows designed to maximize natural light and ventilation.
Smaller windows to ensure proper ventilation in the kitchen area.

rooms.description: A secondary bedroom with east-facing windows for natural light.
Another well-lit bedroom complementing the overall design of the duplex.
A functional bathroom placed according to local building norms and Vastu guidelines on privacy.

openings.description: A strategically placed staircase ensuring a smooth transition between floors.

rooms.description: An expansive terrace offering outdoor living space, designed to face the north for positive energy and views of the garden.

openings.description: A dedicated opening leading to the rooftop terrace ensuring safety and ease of access.
